message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product. It's an exceptional item that I believe would greatly benefit you. Considering its value to me and its worth to you, I propose a price of $120 for this product. I hope we can come to an agreement that satisfies both of us.

Thank you for the offer, Alice.  While I appreciate the value of the product, $120 is a bit higher than I'm willing to pay.  I'm interested in purchasing, but would be happy to pay $90 for it.  Let me know if that works for you.

Thank you for your response, Bob. I understand your position and appreciate your willingness to negotiate. In order to find a mutually beneficial solution, I am willing to consider a price of $105 for the product. I believe this strikes a good balance between the value I place on it and what you're willing to pay. I look forward to your consideration of this offer.

Alice, thanks again for being willing to work with me.  $105 is closer to my price point, but I'm still hoping we can land closer to $100. I'd be happy to pay $100 for the product. Let me know if that works for you.
